fullText: Janet McTeer and Harriet Walter bring such force and intelligence to their roles as the rival queens that they make Schiller's somewhat creaky 1800 melodrama feel surprisingly vital.
dtliExcerpt: Janet McTeer and Harriet Walter bring such force and intelligence to their roles as the rival queens that they make Schiller's somewhat creaky 1800 melodrama feel surprisingly vital.
